course_description: APRNs will increase their knowledge and skills to effectively assess and manage ostomy issues, including continent diversions, creation and management of fistulas, and pelvic reservoir management.  This online course delivers evidence-based didactic instruction via video.
sections: Class Nbr: 5507, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: R. Murphree, Status: Open
